amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $20 million for enforcement and border affairs at the Immigration and Naturalization Service for a program of alternatives to detention for aliens who are not considered a danger to the commmunity or who are not likely to abscond.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A019). The amendment sought to earmark funds not authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
